title: ISic030018. ISic030018
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΔᾹΜΟΣΡΑ(scil. ΜΝΑ)

l.1 δᾱμοσία

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Dubois points out that the same inscription is found, in Sicily, on a loom weight now in the Museo Paolo Orsi di Siracusa (Orsi 1906, 679, no. 1, fig. 510 ). The weight of 418 g corresponds to two talents of silver, each weighing 208.8 g (Dubois IGDS no. 152).

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 26, pl. XI.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Dubois 1989 152 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • 16.0547 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
